BOT_NAME.description: Enter bot name of your choice here

TYPE_MENU.description: Enter menu of your type,,menu types are V1-V8

AUTOSW_VIEW.description: Type true if you want your bot to view status updates or else type false

WELCOME.description: Type true if you want your bot to send welcome or goodbye messages in groups or else type fals

ANTI_CALL.description: Type true if you want bot to reject incoming calls or else type false

AUTO_BLOCK.description: Type true if you want bot to block unknown numbers if else type false

ANTIFOREIGN_NUMBER.description: Enter antiforeignnumbers with country codes if you don't want antiforeign numbers

PREFIX.description: Enter bot prefix of your choice if else leave blank for multiprefixes

AUTO_RECORD.description: type true if you want bot to indicate recording or else type false
